title: Emerald Floral Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS Clarity
natural Emeralds (Square cut & Pear cut). Adorned with freshwater pearls.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a tiered floral design, meticulously set with dazzling diamonds. Emeralds are gracefully incorporated into the floral motifs, adding a touch of regal elegance. The pendant features a large square-cut Emerald at its center, surrounded by a diamond-encrusted design reminiscent of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship. Delicate pearl drops enhance the overall allure.
colors: accentuated by the rich green of the Emeralds and the soft luster of the pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaaham)
and special celebrations. It's also a stunning statement piece for upscale events and contemporary gatherings.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional Hyderabadi artistry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and vibrant Emeralds ensure a lasting sparkle and timeless appeal. The meticulous craftsmanship guarantees durability and a luxurious feel, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. It is a 'Sarva Sampoorna' piece, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
